title: How to Get Snorunt in Pok√©mon Emerald

steps.title: Go to Shoal Cave.
steps.content: Go to Shoal Cave. Shoal Cave is behind Mossdeep city. Use HM Surf to get there.

steps.title: Be sure that the time is between 3:00 AM to 9:00 AM, or 3:00 PM to 9:00 PM.
steps.content: Be sure that the time is between 3:00 AM to 9:00 AM, or 3:00 PM to 9:00 PM. This is because you can only find one during those times, and that is when the tides are low.

steps.title: Go to the far corner of the cave, and you will come across a karate guy.
steps.content: Go to the far corner of the cave, and you will come across a karate guy.

steps.title: To the right of the cave, you will find a boulder.
steps.content: To the right of the cave, you will find a boulder. Use HM Strength to move it around.

steps.title: Find the ladder and climb down it.
steps.content: Find the ladder and climb down it. You will be in a room completely filled with ice.

steps.title: Walk around the room until Snorunt appears.
steps.content: Walk around the room until Snorunt appears. Snorunt is very rare, so it may be a while until you find one.

steps.title: Be careful while battling Snorunt.
steps.content: Be careful while battling Snorunt. If it faints, good luck finding it again.
